content: sleeve band k until 3 sts remain p3 54 sts sleeves and cuff ribbing 4 row row 33 purl row 34 p3 k until 3 sts remain p3 row 35 purl row 36 p3 k until 3 sts remain p3 54 sts ribbed neckband 3 row note if making for a toy make the neckband opening wider to allow it to fit over the toy s head eg 15 rib sts row 37 p22 k1 p1 x2 k2tog p1 k1 x2 p22 53 sts row 38 p3 k19 p1 k1 p1 x4 k19 p3 row 39 p22 k1 p1 x4 k1 p22 neck opening 2 row row 40 p3 k19 bind off the 9 ribbed neckband sts knit until 3 sts remain p3 row 41 p22 loosely cast 9 sts onto the rh needle then purl the remaining 22 sts 53 sts the front of the sweater is now complete ribbed neckband and start working on the back 3 row row 42 p3 k19 p1 k1 p1 x4 k19 p3 row 43 p22 k1 p1 k1 x4 p22 row 44 as for row 42 53 sts sleeves and cuff ribbing 5 row row 45 p26 m1p p to the end of the row 54 sts row 46 p3 k to last 3 sts p3 row 47 purl row 48 p3 k to last 3 sts p3 row 49 purl 54 sts binding off the sleeves 6 row row 50 rs holding sweater in your lh fold the sleeve s cast on edge upwards towards the lh needle the sleeve will be folded right sides together the cast on edge will lay alongside and in front of the lh needle from the wrong side of the sleeve s cast on edge insert the tip of the rh needle through the 1st stitch and then continue through the 1st stitch on the lh needle knit through both layers ie through the cast on edge and the stitch on the lh needle as if you are performing a knit 2 together stitch when this is complete you will have a single stitch on the rh needle *work another stitch the same way inserting your rh needle tip through the sleeve s next cast on st and the next st on the lh needle you will now have 2 sts on the rh needle bind off 1 st mrs rose designs… 3 this pattern is for your personal use only © mrsrosedesigns1@gmail com christmas bunting sweater repeat from * until another 3 sts have been bound off 4 sts bound off in all knit across the row until 3 sts remain p3 50 sts row 51 fold the sleeve lengthwise again right sides together so that the sleeve s cast on edge lies alongside the lh needle this time the lh needle will be at the front and the sleeve s cast on edge will be at the back insert the tip of the rh needle purlwise through the wrong side of the 1st
